src:
Mesarji pridejo nabrušeni v Portorož
06 Nov 2019, 06:01 by Boris Planinc

Po napovedih naj bi bilo letošnje drugoligaško prvenstvo zelo izenačeno in tudi favorizirano Mesarijo Prunk na lokalnem primorskem obračunu v Luciji najbrž ne čaka enostaven večer. Lahko mornarji v tretjem poskusu odprejo tekmo s polno močjo?



Drevišnji obalno-kraški košarkarski obračun bo gotovo obeležil tudi Američan Tim Cole (z žogo), ki je poleti iz Portoroža prestopil v Sežano.  Foto: Zdravko Primožič/FPA

PORTOROŽ > Za zdaj je lestvica druge SKL še dokaj kaotična, saj so nekatera moštva odigrala že po pet srečanj, Portorož pa denimo vsega dve, predvsem zavoljo obveznosti Adina Kavgića v zaključku sezone 3x3 košarke. Korošec z obalnim domicilom se je medtem že vrnil z Japonske, kjer je z ekipo Pirana na finalu svetovnega pokala zasedel peto mesto, tako da ima domači trener Igor Kešelj na voljo praktično popolno zasedbo, nekaj težav ima na začetku sezone zgolj Sebastjan Borse. Portorožani bodo še tretjo letošnjo tekmo odigrali v svoji dvorani, obe dosedanji pa so začeli zelo zaspano, kar proti nekonkurenčni Ljubljani sicer ni imelo vpliva na končni izid, zato pa Smodiševih Trotov po ogromnem uvodnem zaostanku z 2:21 niso več mogli ujeti. Igor Kešelj je očitno že na otvoritveni tekmi prvenstva zaznal težavo: “Opozarjal sem fante, naj začnejo na vso moč, a smo kljub temu potrebovali skoraj 15 minut, da smo ujeli pravi ritem.” Tokrat si gostitelji podobnega luksuza ne morejo privoščiti, kajti Mesarija Prunk je podobno kot Troti dovolj kakovostna, da darilo sprejme z obema rokama ter zaključi srečanje, še preden bi se to šele prav začelo.
Na težavni preizkušnji bo predvsem novi portoroški center Aleksa Kojadinović, na katerega čaka njegov predhodnik Tim Cole, ki se je poleti preselil v Sežano prav iz lucijske dvorane, kjer je sploh prvič okusil resno tekmovalno košarko. Nekaj njegovih lanskih številk sodi skoraj v rubriko Guinessovih rekordov, ko je denimo skoraj natanko pred letom proti škofjeloškemu LTH dosegel težko verjetnih 19 točk, 26 skokov ter 12 blokad!? In z moštvom vseeno izgubil tekmo ... Gotovo se bo na nasprotni strani počutil vsaj malce nenavadno. S soigralci je po štirih odigranih srečanjih še neporažen, s čimer se lahko pohvali le še Triglav, kar je skladno z napovedjo portoroškega trenerja Kešlja, kdo bi letošnjo sezono lahko krojil vrh drugoligaške razpredelnice: “Všeč mi je igra Triglava, negotovo so pričeli LTH, Celje in Ilirija, močni pa so Sežanci, medtem ko naše želje segajo do končnice.”
Večinoma se igralci med seboj dobro poznajo, zato so posebna taktična presenečenja izključena. Če upoštevamo statistiko, je prednost mesarjev predvsem čvrsta obramba, kajti tekmeci so doslej proti njim povprečno komaj presegli 65 košev. Toda tudi za mornarje velja, da so najnevarnejši, ko je nasprotnik absolutni favorit, uspeh proti sosedom pa je vedno najslajši.
text:
Butchers come bustled to Portorož
06 Nov 2019, 06:01 by Boris Planinc

According to forecasts, this year's second-league championship is expected to be very even and the favored Butchery Prunk is probably not waiting for an easy evening at the local coastal showdown in Lucia. Can Sailors open the match at full power in the third attempt?



The ancient coast-Karst basketball show will also be celebrated by American Tim Cole (with the ball), who transferred from Sežana to Portoroz in the summer. Photo: Zdravko Primozic / FPA

PORTOROŽ> For now, the scale of the second SKL is quite chaotic, with some teams having played five matches each, and Portorož, for example, just two, mainly because of Adin Kavgic's commitment at the end of the 3x3 basketball season. Korošec, with his coastal domicile, has already returned from Japan, where he finished fifth with the Piran team at the World Cup final, leaving home coach Igor Kešelj with a practically perfect lineup, with only Sebastjan Borse having some problems at the beginning of the season. The Portorož players will play in their own hall for the third time this year, but both have started to be very sleepy, which did not affect the final result against the incompetent Ljubljana, so after the huge introductory delay of 2:21 they could no longer catch. Igor Keselj had evidently noticed the problem already at the opening match of the championship: "I warned the boys to start their full strength, but it still took almost 15 minutes to catch the right rhythm." Like Trotti, Prunk is of sufficient quality to accept the gift with both hands and end the meeting before it is even just begun.
The new Portorož center, Aleksa Kojadinović, will be in a difficult test, and his predecessor Tim Cole is waiting, who moved to Sežana in the summer from Lucija hall, where he first tasted serious competitive basketball. Some of his numbers last year belong almost to the Guiness records section, when, for example, he almost hit 19 points, 26 rebounds and 12 blocks almost exactly a year ago against Bishop LTH !? And with the team losing the match anyway ... He will certainly feel at least a little strange on the opposite side. He is still undefeated with his teammates after four games played, and only Triglav can boast, which is in line with the announcement of Portorož coach Keselj, who could top the second league table this season: “I like the game of Triglav, LTH started uncertain Celje and Illyria, and the Sežani are strong, while our desires reach the playoffs. ”
For the most part, players know each other so special tactical surprises are excluded. Considering the statistics, the advantage of the butchers is above all a solid defense, as their competitors have so far barely exceeded 65 baskets against them. But even sailors are said to be the most dangerous when the opponent is an absolute favorite, and success against neighbors is always the sweetest.
